column2: elevated diner food that can't be found elsewhere.  Service was on point when we went on Friday night.  Arrived around 6:15 to a 30-40 minute wait
column3: were encouraged to wait near the bar with a menu in a space with a dedicated server who would take care of our drink orders.  No trying to weasel past people sitting at the bar to get an order in.  I was impressed with how they handle the crowd at the very small restaurant.  The beer list is impressive with lots of drafts.  The food was all real tasty (burgers
column7: not for dieters) and reasonably priced.
